meanings.sent1: Glycines are essential for building proteins in our bodies.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the structure of glycines in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The glycines in the recipe gave the dish a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: Her love for biology was as strong as the bonds between glycines.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the intricate pattern of glycines was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: The container held various glycines for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: She added the glycines to the solution one by one.
meanings.sent3: The glycines on the shelf seemed to be multiplying overnight!
meanings.sent4: In the field of chemistry, glycines play a crucial role.
meanings.sent5: The bag of glycines spilled, creating a colorful mess on the floor.
